movies.name: HellBoy
movies.overview: Based on the graphic novels by Mike Mignola, Hellboy, caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human, battles an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.

movies.name: Taken
movies.overview: A former spy (Neeson) relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter (Grace), who has been forced into the slave trade.
